Detailed Description

The debug manager singleton.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ckDbgMgr::DebugMode

The debug modes.

Enumerator:
MODE_OFF  Debug output is invisible.

MODE_MONITOR  Monitor mode.

MODE_CONSOLE  Console mode.
